channel.title: Doubt on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Doubt on Silence Speaks

item.title: Bad Behavior
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: Do you happen to have A cigarette I could bum? Just to hold in my hand To help reminisce some To bring me back to a time When I had it all together And the worst of my worries Was exploring Minecraft's Nether. In fact, could I please Borrow your lighter as well? I won't actually smoke it; I promise to not inhale. Just the act of smoking Puts my mind at ease And places it in Bear Creek Enjoying the summer's breeze.
